boat.full_description: Traditional (probably hemp) running rigging and wooden blocks. 3 ft bowsprit. Photographed at Bosham 1930s.Vessel bought by present owner 2015 from Heybridge, Blackwater, Essex; brought by road to York; by river to Brough 2017. Saftey equipment (jackstays, fire extinguisher) but no electrics. Compass. CQR and kedge anchors, with chain and warp.
boat.name: Sprite
boat.short_description: Gaff rig with wire standing rigging (forestay, shrouds x 2 each side). Small cabin with twin berths, just sitting headroom. Outboard engine (Tohatsu 5 hp 2-stroke). Survey April 2022 by A C Yacht Surveyors
